name: Infinite Corridor (honzaSL)
description:
Control: standard WASD and Space. 

Its simple game your only task is find and enter door, but ....

The game also has a timer that will show you how long you run confusedly in a single endless corridor, but on the end you can try flex with your final score :D in online scoreboard. (score is calculated very simply 100 000 - your time in secodns)

Some environment is randomized, like clouds (just color but its seems little bit trippy :D )
